patthana14.8:4.1: Anidassanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.8:4.2: Anidassanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.8:4.3: Anidassanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassano ca naanidassano ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana14.8:5.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
